token.description: Authentication token obtained from 'kubectl describe secret <secret_name>'

accept.description: It is used to set specified media type.

message.description: A sentence describing the context for the featured playlists.

limit.description: The maximum number of items to return

offset.description: The index of the first item to return

country.description: The country (an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code)

locale.description: The desired language, consisting of an ISO 639 language code and an ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code, joined by an underscore. For example: es_MX, meaning 'Spanish (Mexico)'.

timestamp.description: A timestamp in ISO 8601 format (yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss) with the user's local time to get results tailored to a specific date and time in the day. If not provided, it defaults to the current UTC time. Example: '2014-10-23T09:00:00' for a user whose local time is 9AM.
